00043 void Error::error(std::string theError, ...) {
00044     //Take all the args in, type cast them do all that fun stuff then put it in a buffer of 1024 chars (no mas please
00045     const char * msg = theError.c_str();
00046     va_list args;
00047     va_start(args,msg);
00048     char buffer[1024];
00049     char writeBuffer[1024];
00050     vsprintf(buffer,msg,args);
00051 
00052     #ifdef _WIN32
00053         sprintf(writeBuffer, "%s: %s", __FUNCTION__, buffer);
00054     #else
00055         sprintf(writeBuffer, "%s: \033[41;1m%s %s\033[0m\r\n", __FUNCTION__, buffer);
00056     #endif
00057     printf(writeBuffer);
00058     Error::getInstance()->writeLine(buffer);
00059 }
